segments.text: The scene shows a typical kitchen with a woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate and towel, facing away from the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet, filling and spilling over the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It streams down the cabinet fronts to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stands on a stool near the open cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate, perhaps to steady himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly backward under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, arm extended toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink reveals a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in natural light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a domestic setting with some unusual elements.
segments.speaker: PAR
